Text: Can someone help me , i installed it with the installer like normal but after it was finnished and when i tried to start the Sniperelite.exe it said something about a file d3d11.dll and i cant seem to find it so i guess its missing. does anyone know how to fix this, if so please try to contact me

@ wickeddoodle

update your DirectX. It should solve your problem. :)

download missing dll from here: http://www.dll-files.com/    and copy in C:WindowsSystem32

Ok everything went fine...i start the game it runs for 5 - 10 min then PC crashes (have the same prob. with Prototyp 2 & Mass Effect 3)...GC Driver updated tried diff crack but no change...any suggestions???
